product_name: REI Knit Peruvian Hat - Infant/Toddler Girls'
long_description: The REI Knit Peruvian hat keeps little girls' heads warm and toasty, whether they're walking in a winter wonderland or strolling down an leaf-covered sidewalk. Knit blend of nylon, wool, acrylic, angora and viscose provides natural insulation and warmth without being itchy or uncomfortable. Soft sherpa fleece lining feels comfortable against the skin and enhances insulation.
short_description: The REI Knit Peruvian hat keeps little girls' heads warm and toasty, whether they're walking in a winter wonderland or strolling down an leaf-covered sidewalk.
